problem: Given J is the midpoint of FH. J is the midpoint of GI and FH . Complete the proof that HI∥FG . (Elements:  ∠HIJ ,  ∠HJI ,  ∠FJG ,  HI ,  HJ ,  FJ ,  △HIJ ,  GJ ,  IJ ,  ∠FGJ ,  FG ,  △FGJ , )
statement: J is the midpoint of GI
J is the midpoint of FH
reason: Converse of Alternate Interior Angles Theorem
